channel.title: CVE Feed for FANUC -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for FANUC -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-38483|2024-09-16T16:38:37.684Z -- fanuc -- roboguide
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable to misconfigured binaries, allowing users on the target PC with SYSTEM level privileges access to overwrite the binary and modify files to gain privilege escalation.

item.title: CVE-2021-32996|2024-09-16T18:24:56.616Z -- fanuc -- r-30ia%2C%20r-30ia%20mate
item.description: The FANUC R-30iA and R-30iB series controllers are vulnerable to integer coercion errors, which cause the device to crash. A restart is required.

item.title: CVE-2021-43990|2024-09-16T19:47:07.470Z -- fanuc -- roboguide
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable to a network-based attack by threat actors supplying a crafted, malicious XML payload designed to trigger an external entity reference call.
